title: Japan Q2 GDP revised down to 1.3% annualised growth
text:
Japan's economy grew an annualised 1.3 per cent in April-June, less than the initial estimate of a 1.8 per cent expansion, revised data from the Cabinet Office showed on Monday.

[TOKYO] Japan's economy grew an annualised 1.3 per cent in April-June, less than the initial estimate of a 1.8 per cent expansion, revised data from the Cabinet Office showed on Monday.

The revised figure for gross domestic product matched economists' median forecast in a Reuters poll.

On a quarter-on-quarter basis GDP expanded 0.3 per cent, compared with a 0.4 per cent growth in the initial reading and a median forecast of 0.3 per cent.

REUTERS
description: : THE BUSINESS TIMES Government & Economy - [TOKYO] Japan's economy grew an annualised 1.3 per cent in April-June, less than the initial estimate of a 1.8 per cent expansion, revised data from the Cabinet Office showed on Monday. . Read more at The Business Times.
